title: Council Regulation (EEC) No 777/87 of 16 March 1987 modifying the intervention arrangements for butter and skimmed-milk powder
header:
COUNCIL  REGULATION (EEC) No 777/87
of 16 March 1987
modifying the intervention arrangements for butter and skimmed-milk powder
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The measures referred to in Article 1 shall apply until the end of the fifth 12-month period of application of the additional levy arrangements set out in Article 5c of Regulation (EEC) No 804/68.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 16 March 1987.
For the Council
The President
L. TINDEMANS
